mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mocojee5 (mosubNum, mosubName, moSpot, moPlace1, moPlace2, maxPeople, moCost, moStart, moEnd , moDate, geNum, moCreated ) VALUES( subNum_seq.NEXTVAL , #{mosubName}, #{moSpot}, #{moPlace1}, #{moPlace2}, #{maxPeople}, #{moCost}, #{moStart}, #{moEnd}, TO_DATE(#{moDate}, 'mm/dd/yyyy'), #{geNum}, SYSDATE)
